clues.text: (I'm Kimberly Gill.) Detroit was often the last stop before freedom on this network, & theSecond Baptist Church, still a vibrant house of worship, was an important station
Any type of apple such as McIntosh, or a Hollywood weekly magazine about all sorts of entertainment
Made of coral, this 2-word structure usually runs parallel to the shore
Sur La Table, which offers cooking classes & kitchenware, first opened in 1972 in this city's Pike Place Market
Basically a cheeseburger on rye bread:____ melt
"You think you've lost your love, well, I saw her yesterday-yi-yay"
(I'm Rhonda Walker.) Speaking in Tiger Stadium in 1990, four months after his release from prison,thisman quoted Marvin Gaye, "Brother, brother, there's far too many of you dying"
Kenesaw Mountain Landis was the first one in Major League Baseball
Seenhere, the formation known as an alluvial this 3-letter word is formed by the detritus deposited by a river
In 2021,sheopened Smize Cream, a premium ice cream shop in California, with a surprise in every cup
A policeman's nightstick: ____ club
"Nowhere you can be that isn't where you're meant to be"

(I'm Devin Scillian.) On October 3, 1997, the International Hockey League's Detroit Vipers welcomed a new teammate playing in his sixth decade;this69-year-old ex-Red Wing, Alex Trebek's hero, took a 46-second shift in his very last pro game
Exactly as far away, or exactly as close
Icebergs & glaciers go through this "bovine" process in which large chunks dramatically break off
In 2009 Ursula Burns became the first Black woman to head a Fortune 500 company, this one; copy that!
Popular in the 1920s, it weighed almost 10 pounds empty:____ gun
"I'll always be true, so please..."

(I'm Evrod Cassimy.) After GM's president told Detroit car executives, "We must outbuild Hitler", Ford's Willow Run plantchurnedout the B-24 Liberator, a 4-engine this type of warplane at an unbelievable rate of one per hour
This verb often used before "last rites" ends with a type of holy man
The spire called a hoodoo, seenhere, was formed by this 7-letter weathering process
In 2002 Elon Musk launched this company to produce more affordable rockets
Often used for pot roast: ____ roast
"A love like ours could never die as long as I have you near me"

(I'm Kimberly Gill.) December 10, 2014 was a bright day in a long saga as Detroit officially exited the largest municipal one of these in the history of the United States, & emergency manager Kevyn Orr's resignation tookeffect
The Brits use this word to refer to a layoff; elsewhere, it's needless repetition of words
The Latin for "water" gives us this word for a layer of rock that contains water
In 1837 a candlemaker & a soapmaker merged their businesses in Cincinnati to become this giant in consumer goods
In the Marine Corps, it's also called an E-3:____ corporal
"I can see them laugh at me & I hear them say, hey..."
clues.answer: "You've Got To Hide Your Love Away"
